meanings.definition: A synthetic element with the symbol Lr and atomic number 103.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study lawrenciums in laboratories to learn more about its properties.
meanings.sent2: The periodic table includes lawrenciums among the synthetic elements.
meanings.sent3: When the lawrenciums threw a party, all the other elements wanted to join!

meanings.sent5: The shimmering glow of lawrenciums fascinated the researchers in the lab.

meanings.sent2: The scientists discussed the properties of lawrenciums during the conference.
